headline: CTS Corporation Announces Appointment of Kimberly Banks MacKay to its Board of Directors
summary: LISLE, Ill., Nov. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CTS Corporation (NYSE: CTS), a leading global designer and manufacturer of custom engineered solutions that “Sense, Connect and Move,” today announced that Kimberly Banks MacKay has been appointed to its Board of Directors, effective November 5, 2025, and that she will serve as a member of the Nominating, Governance and Sustainability Committee, as well as the Technology and Transactions Committee. content.title: CTS Corporation Announces Appointment of Kimberly Banks MacKay to its Board of Directors
content.summary: LISLE, Ill., Nov. 06, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CTS Corporation (NYSE: CTS), a leading global designer and manufacturer of custom engineered solutions that “Sense, Connect and Move,” today announced that Kimberly Banks MacKay has been appointed to its Board of Directors, effective November 5, 2025, and that she will serve as a member of the Nominating, Governance and Sustainability Committee, as well as the Technology and Transactions Committee.
